document.full_text: mexican finance minister ernesto cordero said on thursday he wants to run for president in the 2012 race that will revolve around spiraling drug violence and a moribund job market.
document.title: mexico's cordero takes aim at presidency in 2012
lines_and_colors: mexican finance minister ernesto cordero said on thursday he wants to run for president in the 2012 race that will revolve around spiraling drug violence and a moribund job market.
